statements: SELECT * FROM musical_scales;
SELECT scale_name, scale_type FROM musical_scales WHERE scale_type = 'Major';
SELECT * FROM musical_scales WHERE tonic_note = 'C';
SELECT scale_name, interval_structure FROM musical_scales WHERE scale_id > 3;
SELECT scale_id, scale_type, tonic_note FROM musical_scales ORDER BY scale_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM musical_scales WHERE scale_type = 'Major' ORDER BY scale_name DESC;
SELECT scale_name, tonic_note FROM musical_scales WHERE scale_type = 'Minor' ORDER BY scale_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT scale_type FROM musical_scales WHERE tonic_note = 'C';
SELECT scale_name, interval_structure FROM musical_scales WHERE tonic_note = 'D' AND scale_type = 'Minor';
SELECT scale_name, tonic_note, interval_structure FROM musical_scales WHERE scale_type = 'Major' AND tonic_note IN ('C', 'G', 'D');
SELECT * FROM MusicalScales;
SELECT scale_name, scale_notes, scale_id FROM MusicalScales;
SELECT scale_name, scale_id FROM MusicalScales WHERE scale_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM ScaleRelationships;
SELECT parent_scale_id, child_scale_id, relationship_type FROM ScaleRelationships WHERE parent_scale_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM MusicalScales WHERE scale_id = 1;
SELECT scale_name, scale_notes, scale_id FROM MusicalScales WHERE scale_name LIKE '%major%';
SELECT scale_name AS ScaleName, scale_notes AS Notes FROM MusicalScales WHERE scale_id IN (3, 5);
SELECT * FROM ScaleRelationships WHERE relationship_type = 'Relative' ORDER BY parent_scale_id ASC, child_scale_id DESC;
SELECT parent_scale_id, COUNT(child_scale_id) AS ChildScalesCount FROM ScaleRelationships GROUP BY parent_scale_id HAVING COUNT(child_scale_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM musical_scales;
SELECT scale_name, scale_notes FROM musical_scales;
SELECT scale_name, scale_notes FROM musical_scales WHERE scale_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM scale_relationships ORDER BY relationship_id DESC;
SELECT theory_name FROM music_theory WHERE theory_id = 3;
SELECT scale_name, scale_notes FROM musical_scales WHERE scale_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM scale_relationships WHERE relationship_type = 'Similar';
SELECT theory_name, theory_description FROM music_theory ORDER BY theory_name DESC;
SELECT scale_id, scale_name, scale_notes FROM musical_scales WHERE scale_name LIKE '%Major%';
SELECT * FROM scale_relationships WHERE scale1_id = 1 OR scale2_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM traditional_scales;
SELECT scale_name, tonic_note FROM traditional_scales WHERE scale_id = 1;
SELECT scale_name, note_sequence FROM modern_scales WHERE mode_type = 'Major';
SELECT scale_id, scale_name, mode_type FROM modern_scales ORDER BY scale_id DESC;
SELECT relationship_id, scale_id1, scale_id2, relationship_type FROM scale_relationships WHERE relationship_type = 'Relative';
SELECT scale_name, tonic_note FROM traditional_scales WHERE scale_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM modern_scales WHERE mode_type = 'Major' AND scale_id > 5 ORDER BY scale_name DESC;
SELECT scale_name, note_sequence FROM traditional_scales WHERE tonic_note IN ('C', 'D', 'E') LIMIT 10;
SELECT scale_name, mode_type, note_sequence FROM modern_scales WHERE scale_id BETWEEN 3 AND 7;
SELECT scale_name AS 'Name', note_name AS 'Note', position_in_scale AS 'Position' FROM scale_notes WHERE scale_id = 4 ORDER BY position_in_scale DESC;
SELECT * FROM traditional_scales;
SELECT scale_name FROM modern_scales;
SELECT scale_id, scale_name FROM traditional_scales WHERE scale_id = 1;
SELECT scale_id, scale_name FROM traditional_scales ORDER BY scale_name DESC;
SELECT scale_name, scale_type FROM modern_scales;
SELECT * FROM traditional_scales;
SELECT scale_id, scale_name FROM modern_scales WHERE scale_id = 10;
SELECT scale_name, scale_type FROM modern_scales ORDER BY scale_type DESC;
SELECT scale1_id, scale2_id, relation_type FROM scale_relations WHERE relation_type = 'harmonic';
SELECT note_name, scale_name, property_name FROM scale_notes INNER JOIN scale_properties ON scale_notes.scale_id = scale_properties.scale_id;
